full_summary:
================

### Tender Announcement

**Title (English):** Liquid Level Switch
**Title (French):** Contacteur, niveau de liquide

**Reference Number:** 51514095
**Amendment Number:** 8
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-242253/A
**Publication Date:** November 22, 2023
**Closing Date:** January 18, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date:** January 18, 2024

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the procurement of Liquid Level Switches (Units 1 and 2) for the Royal Canadian Navy.

**Specifications:**

- **Unit 1:** 40 pieces, GSIN 5930, equivalent to GEMS SENSORS INC, part number 43910, NCAGE: 04034, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
- **Unit 2:** 52 pieces, GSIN 5930, equivalent to GEMS SENSORS INC, part number 43910, NCAGE: 04034, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.

**Bidding Requirements:**

- Bidders are required to submit prices in Canadian dollars. Any bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
- Canadian bidders are preferred, and suppliers must state their brand name and model or part number and NCAGE for any equivalent or substitute product.
- The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Notice Requirements

- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- Suppliers must submit their bids electronically, and the original bid package with signatures must be submitted separately.
- Non-compliance with these instructions may result in rejection of the bid.

### Contact Information

- Name: Jean-Pierre Normandin
- Email: [Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
- Phone: (819) 939-3674

### Attachments

- The Tender Notice document is available at [1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25477/rfp-w8482-242253-a-en.pdf).
- Amendments to the tender notice are available at [2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25477/rfp-w8482-242253-a-amendment-2--en
